source_text: The Company has agreed to grant Rockland (or its nominee) a 1.5% net smelter royalty on all gold produced from M 24/974 (Royalty). The Company shall have a first right of refusal to re-purchase the Royalty from Rockland, on commercial arm's length terms, should Rockland decide to sell the Royalty.
additional_details: The royalty is granted by The Company (Dundas Minerals) to Rockland (or its nominee) on all gold produced from Mining Licence M 24/974. The Company has a first right of refusal to re-purchase the Royalty.
